mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_mycat_syssql ( DB_NAME, START_TIME, START_TM, EXECUTE_TIME, ID, USER, CONTENT, IPAddr ) values( #{DB_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{START_TIME, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{START_TM, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{EXECUTE_TIME, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{ID, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{USER, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SQL, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{IP, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

select SID,START_TIME,START_TM,EXECUTE_TIME,ID,USER,DB_NAME,CONTENT as "SQL",IPAddr from t_mycat_syssql
and SID = #{SID}

select count(1) from t_mycat_syssql
and SID = #{SID}
